name: Shards of Swords And Vengeance
description:
Note: This game has flashing lights and shaking screens, you can turn them off but you have been warned

Arrow keys to move

esc to go to menu

Although I did try to make it not a rougelike, it ended up being a rougelike metroidvania thing, but eyy, making a boss and powerups is good practice, although the boss is broken

well, this code might be the worst I have done, I am never going to touch this monstrosity of spaghetti again.

But eyyyyyy, lore

cinematic universe time

And yes, there is only one color at once on the screen due to how the shader I stole works (https://godotshaders.com/shader/gameboy-look/)
